user_query: I'm planning a family vacation to Rome and I need some assistance. Can you fetch the details of a specific screenshot for me? Also, provide me with the available OS-browser combinations and resolutions for LambdaTest Screenshot. Lastly, ping the QuizApp server to check its health.

TaskList.description: Fetch the details of a specific screenshot related to the vacation.
Provide the available OS-browser combinations and resolutions for LambdaTest Screenshot.
Ping the QuizApp server to check its health.
